notes: invariable adverb used to present or draw attention
example_sentence_english: Here is the book you were looking for.

notes: pronominal variant with first person singular
pronominal variant with second person singular
pronominal variant with third person singular masculine
example_sentence_english: Here it is on the table.

notes: pronominal variant with third person singular feminine
pronominal variant with first person plural
pronominal variant with second person plural
example_sentence_english: Here you are, the requested documents.

notes: pronominal variant with third person plural masculine
example_sentence_english: Here they are playing in the garden.

notes: pronominal variant with third person plural feminine
example_sentence_english: Here they are ready to leave.
